smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class WordTypeTests is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class WordTests is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function fabric provider is called when speech is a success is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: FunctionNaming
smells.description: Function names should follow the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Function names should match the pattern: ^([a-z$][a-zA-Z$0-9]*)|(`.*`)$

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: it.arguments[0] cannot be safely cast to Int.

smells.name: ExplicitGarbageCollectionCall
smells.description: Don't try to be smarter than the JVM. Your code should work independently if the garbage collector is disabled or not. If you face memory issues, try tuning the JVM options instead of relying on code itself.

instances.message: An explicit call to the Garbage Collector as in System should not be made.
An explicit call to the Garbage Collector as in System should not be made.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: org.mockito.Mockito.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: TrailingWhitespace
smells.description: Checks which lines end with a whitespace.

instances.message: Line 103 ends with a whitespace.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Private function incompleteValues is unused.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainPresenterUnitTests.

smells.name: ModifierOrder
smells.description: Modifier order should be: private lateinit
